map.name: default
map.item:
Which object matches what you just saw?
Press the left or right button to respond.
When there is a "+", just look at it.
Press either mouse button to begin the next part.

Take a break!
Click the left mouse button to begin when you are ready to move on to the next part.
You will start by doing a few examples for practice.

This task is done. Good job!
Please wait for further instructions.

You have completed [BLOCK_NUMBER] block(s). There are [TOTAL_BLOCKS] blocks in the experiment.
Press either mouse button to move on.
Click the right mouse button to continue.
Click the left mouse button to go back.
Click the right mouse button to start the experiment when you are ready.
Click either mouse button to start the experiment when you are ready.
